ComicInfo.Title: A Hollywood Love Supreme; They'll Never Own a Yacht; Elf-Squelch; Arline 'n' Bob and That Thing in the Bedroom; Mission Nites; Cockroach Crisis; Peter to the Rescue!!; Mode O'Day and Her Pals; Joe Venuti; I Married a Jerk; The Artist Meets a Swinger or...
